sent.orig: One, the contest prepares 1. Delimit contest reviews a problem.
sent.trans: 竞赛准备1．划定竞赛复习题。

sent.orig: Contests include a drilling and mucking contest and a gold-panning contest.
sent.trans: 竞赛项目包括了钻岩和除渣比赛及淘金比赛。

sent.orig: All communication regarding the contest will be via the contest web site.
sent.trans: 所有与竞赛相关的消息将通过竞赛的网站发布。

sent.orig: TIFERT's group in animation competition. Students from both after the contest.
sent.trans: 我院师生参加动画制作比赛。我院学生与英国学生赛后切磋技艺。

sent.orig: The rest because of gerrymandering weren't in any contest.
sent.trans: 其余席位因不公正划分选区的原因而不会面临任何竞争。
